alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:25PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 515 PM MST... At 425 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Gu Vo, or 32 miles southeast of Ajo, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gu Vo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Ali Chugk, Why, Charco 27, Gunsight, Pia Oik, Kuakatch, San Simon West and Lukeville. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 49 and 79. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
